page.title: 12Transport around Brafferton
page.content:
This area is served by two main roads, which are the A1(M) and the A167.
The{motorway}was upgraded about 15 years ago and is the main link between the North-East and London. Regular Express Coaches use this route from Newcastle to the South. However the motorway apparently has had little direct effect on the residents in the area.
It is the{A167}running between Durham, Newton Aycliffe and Darlington that carries most of the local traffic. It is a very busy road and considered a very dangerous one particularly at the turn-off to Brafferton.
